name: A Scarecrow's Life
description:
This is my very early trial release of A Scarecrow's life retro styled platform game.

It uses Peter Morgan's Udemy tutorial: How to Make Tile Based Platform Games in Gamemaker Studio 2 | Udemy as a basis for the mechanics.  

I'm hoping to add more features such as; sound effects, music, tutorial guides, improved graphics, additional enemies and animations and additional melee power ups as I develop further.

Controls are:

Start game = Space

movement = Arrow Keys

Space = Jump (hit space again while in mid air to double jump)

Shift = attack

Z =  Block

X = Interact

R = Reset

Feedback greatly appreciated!
